summary: Frontend build-info label is set to "Version 8" and Settings â†’ Build Info logic appears updated to compare frontend vs backend versions while suppressing mismatch warnings when the backend is errored/unavailable. However, there is no evidence of any backend change/deployment of getBuildInfo() returning Version 8 + non-empty backendTimestamp, and the build/deploy/promotion itself cannot be confirmed from the diff. Several documentation/meta files were modified that were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run a clean build and deployment/promotion to the live (production) environment for the existing Version 8 codebase (no internal build/deployment errors; live URL serves new assets).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows code/doc changes; it does not include any build system logs, CI/CD changes, or deployment/promotion artifacts that demonstrate a clean successful production promotion or cache-busting/new-asset serving on the live URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirm the backend build-info endpoint is deployed and returns Version 8 with a non-empty backendTimestamp; frontend can fetch/display it in live.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files are shown as modified and there is no evidence in the diff that backend/main.mo getBuildInfo() returns version = "Version 8" and a non-empty backendTimestamp, or that the live backend canister was deployed.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a production promotion checklist document (deployment/cache troubleshooting guide).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on retrying the failed promotion and verifying build info in-app; it does not request adding new documentation files/process docs. This may be helpful, but it is not an explicit requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository meta/summary files not tied to the retry/promotion verification requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: These files are not referenced by the BuildRequest requirements/AC, and their changes do not directly implement REQ-64/65/66.
